name: ID Archives
author: Indranil Dasgupta

sections.description:
ID Archives displays WordPress post archives in a simple year and month based list that is easy to peruse, and style.

Use <?php echo id_archives(); ?> in the templates or [id-archives] shortcode within the post.

The HTML structure the plugin puts out is available here. Go ahead and style it with CSS as necessary.

For feature requests, please email indranild@gmail.com.
I can be found (hardly) blogging at Paperboat

TODO

  • Maybe an admin page for markup editing.
  • Options – date based filters etc.
sections.installation:
Installing and getting started with this plugin could not be easier!

  1. Upload the id-archives folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Either place <?php echo id_archives(); ?> in your template file, or use the [id-archives] shortcode.
